medapp_busy1c: There's too much to do right now. Let's talk later.
medapp_busy2c: Sorry, I'm a little busy! Mind if we talk later?

medapp_busy4c: ... Some cats have things to do.
assertive_jealous1: What did I do in a past life to wind up related to you, y_c?
assertive_1: Hey there, y_c! Not bad weather today, hm?
Sun on my pelt, wind in my fur ... Could you imagine being a kittypet and having to be cooped up in a Twoleg nest all day? I think I would go crazy!
Just another reason why it's great to be a Clan cat.
assertiveapp_leader: I'll make all of c_nClan proud!
assertiveapp_6: [t_c stumbles across camp to you, soaking wet and covered in mud.]
y_c! Before you get mad, I didn't do it!
[The very peeved-off looking deputy locks eyes with you and storms in your direction. What mischief did t_c get into this time?]

tm_n really needs me to sort the herb stores right now, and I kinda actually have to focus.

assertive_elder_3: Ahh! There's this new treatment I learned from this wandering healer that we've just gotta try ...

[t_c's eyes flash as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/explain/explains} the method. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} always wanting to try out new and experimental herb combinations and procedures.]

assertive_app29_2: Let me guess. You've come to patch things up between me and r_c, 'cause of the fight we had earlier. That right?

introspective_MedApp: [t_c is staring off into space, looking between some herbs.]
... Oh! Oh, good morning, y_c. I'm sorry, I was looking at these herbs.
They're for travelling herbs, I'm trying to memorise what goes into it, since we make them a lot.
Yeah, staring at them doesn't look productive, but if I memorise them, I'll be able to make them quicker and without asking next time.
I've got to learn quickly, so I can do my job better.
introspective_MedApp_1: y_c? Afternoon. What's brought you to the medicine den? You don't look injured.
Oh, are those raspberries? Thank you for looking out for them.
They're really helpful herbs, but I don't normally ask people to look for them, the risk of them eating deathberries is really high.
I worry about people risking their lives for something I can do myself.
introspective_MedApp_2: You look... worried. Is there anything I can help with?
... I know you're not injured, but my job is to treat you, y_c. That includes your mental wounds. I know, I'm not great at talking, but that doesn't mean my ears don't work.
I'm still working on being a good future medicine cat, and learning to talk to people is part of that. So if it'll help, you coming to me with your problems is helping me learn.
So please, y_c, What can I help you with? What's on your mind?
introspective_MedApp_3: [t_c is sat staring at a chunk of spider web, wrapped around a twig.]
... oh yeah. I'm just looking at this web, I know we use them to clear injuries, but I love staring at them every now and then, they're so intricate.
Spiders spend such a long time working at these webs, and while they're incredibly helpful, I feel we really don't appreciate them enough.
Imagine, such tiny creatures making art, I wonder if they truly comprehend how wonderful their work is. I wonder if they know they're utterly irreplaceable.
Like you, y_c. This Clan wouldn't be home without you.
introspective_MedApp_4: Oh, y_c? What's brought you to the medicine den? Is that a shrew?
Oh, you wanted to share your fresh kill with me? That's sweet, thank you. Let's eat it out in the clearing, so we're out of the way of my mentor looking after the patients.
... Thank you for sharing with me. It's nice knowing that other cats think about me enough to come out the way to spend time with me.
I became a medicine cat to heal my Clan and to look after them, and... well, you coming to look after me means a whole lot.
... I've got to go back to the den now, so my mentor can get something to eat. I'll see you later?
introspective_MedApp_5: y_c? I'm sorry, I'm going to go search for some watermint for my mentor, I'm in a bit of a rush.
Huh, you want to come with me? You can do, of course, if you're not needed here. Would be nice to have the extra paws.
You know, I love going out looking for herbs, it's so quiet out here, it's so alive, yet so still. It's nice to get out of the stress of camp to just... Breathe. You know?
I love my duties, I love being a medicine cat apprentice, I'm looking forward to the day where I get to press my nose to the Moonplace and get my medicine cat name.

The camp's always a bit... much. I didn't think I'd need to interact with cats so much, but I suppose there isn't a path you can walk in the Clan where you can avoid cats, I suppose that's the point of living together.
Even though not all of us are related, we're kin under c_nClan, we've all got a path to walk.
Oh! I think I see some watermint over there. We should get going, or we'll be out all day.
assertivemedcat_queen2: y_c, could you possibly go out and collect some more kitting sticks sometime? I keep forgetting to.
They'll need to be thick, hearty, and strong enough to withstand the wrath of a kitting queen! And you and I both know we don't want to face that wrath ourselves, hehe.
So get out there! Probably some good ones out at the edge of the territory.
assertivemedcat_queensapp3: How goes it, y_c? Ready for another herb lesson?
This leafy one here's called chervil. It's pretty common around the territory, and can be used for bellyaches and infected wounds. It's useful for kitting, too - that'll be good for you to remember.
Watch out for the juice, though! It carries, er, a less than desirable scent.
Come back when you're ready for your next training session!
assertivemedcat_queensapp3_2: How goes it, y_c? Ready for another herb lesson?
This one over here is called borage, and it helps nursing queens bring up their milk supply after they've kitted.
Hey, don't ask me how it works! I'm just the messenger.
Come back when you're ready for your next training session!
assertivemedcat_queensapp4: How goes it, y_c? Ready for another herb lesson?
These spiky leaves over here are raspberry leaves. They help ease a queen's pain while they're kitting.
And, trust me, when you're bringing a new life into the world, you'll need all the help you can get! Hehehe!
Come back when you're ready for your next training session!
assertive_tokit: Hey, y_c! I brought you back something from my last patrol. Take a look!
[t_c drops a colorful feather at your paws.]
You wanna know how I found it? Oh, it's a crazy story. I was on an herb gathering patrol, when I found this huge bird, and ...
[t_c regales you with a daring story full of thrills, twists, and turns.]
... And then I got the feather! Quite the adventure, no?

assertive_medapp: StarClan, these herbs are hard to memorize! I don't know how my mentor does it all!

assertivemedapp_tokit: Whoa! Watch it, little guy, or you'll trample my whole herb supply!

assertivemedapp_3: [You ask t_c why {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} chose to become a medicine cat, given {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} adventurous personality.]
Ah, well, that's easy ... The medicine den is full of adventure!

You might think you know life-or-death situations on the battlefield, but here in the medicine den is where the stakes are really high.
My decisions could be the difference between a Clanmate surviving, or joining our warrior ancestors.
There's lots of different paths a cat can take in this world, but I know this is the path for me. Can you say the same?
assertivemedapp_5: Don't worry, pal. I'll get you patched up in no time ...

assertivemedapp_9: Maybe if I'd just been a little faster, or used a different combination of herbs, then ...

r_i sorta took a turn for the worse, and they really needed all paws on deck in the medicine den.

Oh, and this is- ... oh, you fell asleep. Hehe, let's get you back to the nursery, then.
sweet_medapp_4: Oh, y_c! Why are you crying? What's upsetting you, little buddy?
Do I have an herb for feeling sad? Well, let's see... Ah, I think this'll do just fine! Blackberries and raspberries are sure to ease the sadness and lift your spirit!
Though, it might make your fur a bit colorful, hehe.
sweet_medapp_5: Hey y_c! Would you like to see something cool? I found this really neat looking herb.
It's white lavender!! I've never seen lavender be any other color but purple... Ah, don't eat it! I've been told it's toxic... But it's super cool!
sweet_medapp_6: Now how did you end up here, hmm?
Oh, I see, you snuck in here and had too much honey? Well, try not to do that, it could've been something toxic!
Here you go, hehe. That should help with your bellyache... now get some rest, you're gonna need to sleep some of it off.
sweet_medapp_7: Hm, y_c? You and r_a need someone to tally up points for a competition?
Sure thing! I'll bring some snacks too. Oh, and some herbs in case anyone gets hurt, of course!
sweet_medapp_8: Ah, y_c! Thanks for seeing me, I wanted to know how r_k was doing?
Ah, I see. A small cold... not too unusual for a little one. Here, have these, they should help out some!
sweet_medapp_9: Ah, y_c! Have you seen the yarrow anywhere?! It's important!
Oh thank StarClan you threw it out...!
Some of the kits got into the medicine den, and all of our yarrow was missing.
sweet_medapp_10: [t_c seems really upset, sitting there as two cats argue in {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} den. Looks like a job for you!]
Oh thank StarClan, I need your help, y_c! These two won't stop arguing, and they aren't listening to a word I'm saying!
One of them has a raspy throat... I'm really worried... They might hurt themselves if they keep shouting like that!
You'll help? Thank you so much! Let me go get some honey for that sore throat.. It can't be feeling good right now.
sweet_medapp_11: Oh, y_c! I need your help with something, if you aren't too busy?
tm_n is busy right now, but I have to go out and collect herbs.
I'd rather not go alone... can you come with me? I understand if not, but the others are super busy right now.
sweet_medapp_12: Ah- y_c!! Are you okay? That looked like a nasty fall...
Here, let me take a look, okay? I'll be as fast as I can!
Mmm... Alright, you look okay! Just seems to be bruising a bit. Please be more careful, alright? I- I know I'm just an apprentice, but it's important!
sweet_medapp_13: Hey y_c, I have a question if that's alright?
What's it like being a warrior? I can't imagine wanting to fight anyone, it's why I chose being a medicine cat! Even back when I was a kit, I heard some kits saying I'd be too soft to be a warrior..
I sometimes wonder if they were wrong... Don't get me wrong, I'd never change the path I chose but... I don't know.
sweet_medapp_14: Oh y_c, I have a question if that's alright?
I've always kinda wondered... Why'd you choose to become a medicine cat? I know why I chose to, I don't like the thought of hurting anyone and have always had a love for herbs, but... what about you?
sweet_medapp_15: Ah, y_c! Just the cat who I was looking for!
r_k had a fight with another one of the kits... They um- they tore up the medicine den... Think you could talk to them about it?
Actually- wait-! I... have a small question.
What made you choose the path of a mediator? I know a lot of cats would prefer to serve their whole life hunting and fighting, or healing with herbs like me... But you choose differently... why?
sweet_medapp_16: [You lay there, r_k curled up by your side, watching as the day goes by. {PRONOUN/r_k/subject/CAP} tired {PRONOUN/r_k/self} out playing all sorts of games, and you felt exhausted having to keep up with {PRONOUN/r_k/object}, but it was worth it for such a fun day.]

Is this why you chose to become a queen? This moment of peace...? It's... really nice. It almost makes me want to go up to l_n and ask to swap roles, hehe.
Ah... I could never take care of all of the Clan's kits like this... especially not all day every day... But it does seem really nice. Maybe one day I'll have my own kits to take care of.
I do love caring for others after all, hehe. I get teased about it all the time! Especially by r_a!
sweet_medapp_17: Oh, are you sending out patrols, y_c?

[Before you can say that you don't really need to be thanked that much for that, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/bound/bounds} off. At least {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} happy?

brooding_medapp_8: The medicine den is no place for a kit ...

brooding_medapp_10: *Sigh* What did you do to yourself this time, y_c?

sweet_medapp_19: Oh, y_c! There you are! You've been working so much today, I've barely gotten a chance to catch up!

[{PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/set/sets} up a nest in the den just for you, grabbing some herbs to help you sleep.]

upstanding_medapp: Oh, there you are! Sorry I haven't been here to help, I got a little sidetracked.
With what? Well, you know how you told me the other day that the most hardworking medicine cats are often more successful?
So I may have gotten a bit inspired and well...
How much room do we have in the herb store?
upstanding_medapp1: Hey there y_c! Is it alright if I give you a checkup? Make sure everything is alright?
Yes, I'm doing this again. It's called a 'routine checkup' for a reason! Besides, m_n said that the best way to learn something is just to start doing it, so here I am!
I might have my paws full with all of this, but it's worth it if it means becoming a medicine cat! And helping the Clan. That too of course.
upstanding_medapp2: [You turn to see t_c hiding towards the back of the camp, beckoning you to come closer.]
Look, I need your help with something. I need you to come on a mission with me to get more cobwebs from o_c_n territory. It's urgent.

Don't stare at me like that! I know it's against the code, but the health and safety of my Clanmates matter so much more to me. I wouldn't be doing this at all if I didn't feel like it's important, you know that.
And I need you to come with me just in case we do happen to meet some enemy warriors out there. You're a mediator, they'll listen to you! I think.
Ok, you're a mediator-in-training, but what's the difference? Besides, m_n would never agree to this! That's why I'm asking you.
Please help me, I swear by StarClan that I wouldn't do this if there was any other way.
upstanding_medapp3: [t_c is looking around cautiously, making sure that no one is eavesdropping in on the conversation.]
I know that I'm really not supposed to tell you what StarClan tells me in my dreams, but... Technically, if I don't tell you exactly what they said, then it's not breaking any rules. Technically.
Besides, this is important. Really important.
Just... make sure that you stick to the right path, ok? Stick to what the Warrior Code has taught us; don't stray too far away. Remember what c_nClan has taught you. I need you to trust me on this.

I have to go now. I told tm_n that I would be dropping some herbs for r_k at the nursery, and {PRONOUN/tm_n/subject}'ll be expecting me to be back soon. Just remember what I said. You still have a chance to do the right thing.

brooding_medcat_AJ: [After stepping on a thorn, you go to visit t_c in the medicine den. Swiftly and precisely, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/pull/pulls} it out and {VERB/t_c/bandage/bandages} the wound.]

[You thank t_c warmly for {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} help, and {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/roll/rolls} {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} eyes, impatient.]
I'm only doing my job. Nothing personal about it.
Now, get out of the medicine den. I need to help my next patient.
brooding_medcat_AJ1: [Throughout your stay in the medicine den, you've been visited by countless cats, all of them assuring you on how strong you look and how recovery must be just around the corner.]
[But, late one night, after all the visitors have gone, you quietly ask t_c if it really is true that you're going to get better.]
... You could. But you also might not. It's not a guarantee. There's still a good chance you'll die.
Anyone who tells you otherwise is only being nice.

[t_c says it so bluntly and unflinchingly, as if {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/were/was} stating a simple fact, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} could almost have just as easily been saying 'the sky is blue' or 'the grass is green.']

[But, still, as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} busy {PRONOUN/t_c/self} with organizing the herb stores, you feel the edge of {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} tail brush against your spine, so subtle it could've been a mistake.]
... But I'll do everything in my power to stop that from happening.
upstanding_you_shunnedE4: [Like the rest of the Clan t_c has been openly ignoring your existence, only breaking the act to shoot you the occasional glare and hiss what you can assume are insults under {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} breath.]

[Today is no different as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/sit/sits} outside the medicine den, engrossed in the various stacks of herbs scattered around {PRONOUN/t_c/object}. You watch from the edge of camp as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} carefully {VERB/t_c/sort/sorts} the herbs into neat piles and {VERB/t_c/set/sets} them aside to be stored later.]
[... A job {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/seem/seems} to have taken over ever since your shun. You begin to wonder what other jobs t_c has picked up since then.]
neurotic_newleaf_SQ2: The betony patch is getting waterlogged with all the melting snow. Would you come with me to figure out how to drain it?
If we don't do it soon, there's a decent chance the water will drown most of the plants, and I'm already low on betony specifically...
[You remind t_c that the herbs have survived many previous newleafs, potential flooding from snowmelt included.]
Would you still come with me to check? There was a lot of snow this year...
about_silly_SQ5: c_nClan is lucky to have a medicine cat like plike_r_m_silly.

It's like {PRONOUN/plike_r_m_silly/subject} {VERB/plike_r_m_silly/have/has} an infinite supply of jokes and silly questions for when we get bored in the medicine den, or for when a patient needs cheering up.
The other day, {PRONOUN/plike_r_m_silly/subject} {VERB/plike_r_m_silly/were/was} goofing around with r_s, and r_s smiled despite everything...
It was really nice to see.
about_sweet_AJ: Hmph. neutral_r_m_sweet is a decent healer, but when it comes to dealing with patients, {PRONOUN/neutral_r_m_sweet/subject}{VERB/neutral_r_m_sweet/'re/'s} ... soft. Weak.

{PRONOUN/neutral_r_m_sweet/subject/CAP} can sing lullabies and spout platitudes, but in the end, {PRONOUN/neutral_r_m_sweet/subject} {VERB/neutral_r_m_sweet/don't/doesn't} have what it takes to stare death straight in the eyes and bare {PRONOUN/neutral_r_m_sweet/poss} teeth at it. Whenever we lose a patient, {PRONOUN/neutral_r_m_sweet/subject} {VERB/neutral_r_m_sweet/run/runs} away, crying.
Maybe {PRONOUN/neutral_r_m_sweet/subject} would've been better suited for the life of a queen .... In a place like this, there is absolutely no room for weakness.
assertive_elder2: *Sigh* Can't you see I have important things to do, y_c?
Go back to catching mice, or whatever it is you warriors do.
about_brooding_AJ1: Oh, StarClan, did r_d_brooding call yet another Clanmate a mousebrain? *Sigh* {PRONOUN/r_d_brooding/subject/CAP} sure {VERB/r_d_brooding/tend/tends} to do that a lot ...

Try not to take it too personally, y_c. I know {PRONOUN/r_d_brooding/poss} methods may seem ... unorthodox, but r_d_brooding really isn't a bad cat. {PRONOUN/r_d_brooding/subject/CAP} just {VERB/r_d_brooding/want/wants} to keep everycat safe.
And if scaring cats stiff into confronting their problems is what it takes ... Well, then that's just what {PRONOUN/r_d_brooding/subject}'ll do.
Grief_medicine_H1: Is it strange that I'm afraid to see tg_c at the moonpool?
Not- not afraid, necessarily. But... I'm worried about how I'll react. A medicine cat shouldn't be bawling their eyes out at the half-moon meeting.
Or worse, will I freeze up? Forget what to say? Oh, StarClan, would I forget the prophecy {PRONOUN/tg_c/subject}'d bless c_nClan with?
[You gently remind t_c that {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}'ll do great, even with tg_c present.]
Do you think so? I hope you're right, y_c.
neurotic_tokit_SQ4: [You creep up to t_c, watching {PRONOUN/t_c/object} lay herbs out to dry in the sun. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/jump/jumps} when {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/notice/notices} you.]
H-hi, y_c. Sorry, I need to keep an eye on these herbs so they don't blow away. That means I can't really watch you at the same ti- oh no!
[The wind picks up, sending t_c's carefully arranged leaves flying. t_c dashes after them, frantically trying to bat them out of the air.]
fromkit_neg_shunned_H6: [Despite your pleas for help, the medicine cats refuse to treat you. In a last-ditch effort, you approach t_c, hoping {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} would have some pity for {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} {PRONOUN/y_c/parent}.]
[t_c wordlessly guides you to a secluded area of the camp and treats your wound hurriedly.]
I can't keep doing this, y_c. The Clan is starting to judge me for helping you. Please just... try to find your own herbs and treat yourself.
from_medapp_youshunned_pos_rad2: [You've had a nagging headache all day, and wince in pain just as t_c pads by.]
What's wrong, y_c? I can grab you some herbs.
You don't want me to get in trouble?
Look, if l_n and tm_n are going to punish me for helping a sick cat, they're worse cats than they could ever believe you to be.
from_medapp_youshunned_pos_rad3: [Just as tm_n turns you away from the medicine den, t_c strides over, glowering at {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} mentor.]
Hey, tm_n, you mouse-brain. Wasn't it you who said we have an obligation to help all sick or injured cats, regardless of circumstance?
What's going on, y_c? I might not know exactly how to help, but I'll try my best.
medcat_youshunned_neg_rad1: Sorry, y_c. I can't give you anything. All the herbs are in short supply right now.
[You can see over t_c's shoulder that the medicine den is well stocked, but decide it's not worth arguing.]
medcat_youshunned_neg_rad2: The only treatment for that sick moral code of yours would be deathberries.
medcat_youshunned_neg_rad3: [t_c bristles in anger as you approach the medicine den.]
You know, I haven't been organizing the herb stores as well as I should have...
It'd be so easy to accidentally knock something poisonous into some ordinary herbs and give them to somecat. Accidentally.
[You don't even think that'd be necessary. t_c's tone is venomous enough.]
from_med_youshunned_E2: [t_c slides you a small bundle of herbs to chew while {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/check/checks} up on your injury.]
[You try to clear the obvious tension in the air by attempting to make small talk, which t_c immediately shuts down.]
Don't. Just- don't. I'm only here because my duty as a healer is to treat any cat in need. That's it.
Just because we're littermates doesn't mean that I'm some special exception to your shun. You made your choice, and now you have to deal with the consequences.
medcat_chaotic_innovator_rad1: [You make your way into the medicine den to find that t_c is building some sort of contraption around the herb stock.]
Hi, y_c. What do you need?
Oh, this? Somecat keeps getting into the herb stock and stealing things. Honey and catmint, mostly.
I figured I'd rig up a trap to stop the thief. Step in the wrong spot, and bam - you're showered with sap-coated twigs!
It won't hurt the thief, but it'll be a pain in the tail to get out of their pelt, and if I spot them before they've cleaned it all off, I'll know who the thief is. Smart, huh?
[... Note to self: Never steal herbs from t_c.]
